评论概述: Pink pair will have you feeling like a pop icon
评论详情: I never buy expensive sunglasses. I just don't trust myself not to lose them. So these were a perfect purchase for me. They're on-trend without feeling like fast fashion, and I love both the black and tortoiseshell for everyday. The green are also super fun and because the frames are transparent, my vision is much brighter when I wear them than the opaque pairs. The lenses are still dark but light filters through the actual frames, which I like—it feels like my field of vision is larger. As for the pink pair, I feel a feminine energy overtake me the minute I put them on and I find myself blasting girl pop with the windows down. AND they have UV protection, nice.
